verses.text: Now it came to pass upon a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to the \w Philistines’|strong="H6430"\w* \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w*, that \add is\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w*. But he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* not his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 14.1 \ft it came…: or, there was a day\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w tarried|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w uttermost|strong="H7097"\w* part of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* under a pomegranate \w tree|strong="H7416"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Migron|strong="H4051"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him \add were\add* about \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*;

And \w Ahiah|strong="H0281"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, \w I-chabod’s|strong="H0350"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w wearing|strong="H5375"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* was \w gone|strong="H1980"\w*.\f + \fr 14.3 \ft Ahiah: called Ahimelech\f*

¶ And between the \w passages|strong="H4569"\w*, by which \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto the \w Philistines’|strong="H6430"\w* \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w*, \add there was\add* a \w sharp|strong="H8127"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* on the one \w side|strong="H5676"\w*, and a \w sharp|strong="H8127"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Bozez|strong="H0949"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w Seneh|strong="H5573"\w*.

The \w forefront|strong="H8127"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w situate|strong="H4690"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1387"\w*.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft forefront: Heb. tooth\f*

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto the \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w* of these \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*: it may be that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w work|strong="H6213"\w* for us: for \add there is\add* no \w restraint|strong="H4622"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* by \w many|strong="H7227"\w* or by \w few|strong="H4592"\w*.

And his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* all that \add is\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* thee; behold, I \add am\add* with thee according to thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, Behold, we will pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto \add these\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and we will \w discover|strong="H1540"\w* ourselves unto them.

If they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thus unto us, \w Tarry|strong="H1826"\w* until we \w come|strong="H5060"\w* to you; then we will stand \w still|strong="H5975"\w* in our place, and will not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 14.9 \ft Tarry: Heb. Be still\f*

But if they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thus, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto us; then we will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into our \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and this \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto us.

And \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* themselves unto the \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w holes|strong="H2356"\w* where they had \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* themselves.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w garrison|strong="H4675"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to us, and we will \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* you a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*. And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* climbed \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and upon his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him: and they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*; and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

And that \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*, which \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w made|strong="H5221"\w*, was about \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, within as it were an \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w acre|strong="H4618"\w* of \w land|strong="H7704"\w*, \add which\add* a \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \add of oxen might plow\add*.\f + \fr 14.14 \ft an…: or, half a furrow of an acre of land\f*

And there was \w trembling|strong="H2731"\w* in the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and among all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: the \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w*, and the \w spoilers|strong="H7843"\w*, they also \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w quaked|strong="H7264"\w*: so it was a very \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2731"\w*.\f + \fr 14.15 \ft a very…: Heb. a trembling of God\f*

And the \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*; and, behold, the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* melted \w away|strong="H4127"\w*, and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on beating \w down|strong="H1986"\w* \add one another\add*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w Number|strong="H6485"\w* now, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* who is \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* from us. And when they had \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, behold, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \add were\add* not \add there\add*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahiah|strong="H0281"\w*, Bring \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. For the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was at that \w time|strong="H3117"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, while \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that the \w noise|strong="H1995"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* and \w increased|strong="H7227"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Withdraw|strong="H0622"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 14.19 \ft noise: or, tumult\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him \w assembled|strong="H2199"\w* themselves, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: and, behold, every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* was against his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w*, \add and there was\add* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w discomfiture|strong="H4103"\w*.\f + \fr 14.20 \ft assembled…: Heb. were cried together\f*

Moreover the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \add that\add* were with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w before|strong="H0865"\w* that \w time|strong="H8032"\w*, which went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with them into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \add from the country\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, even they also \add turned\add* to be with the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* that \add were\add* with \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*.

Likewise all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* which had \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* themselves in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \add when\add* they \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, even they also followed \w hard|strong="H1692"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

So the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*.

¶ And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w distressed|strong="H5065"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w adjured|strong="H0422"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \add any\add* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* until \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, that I may be \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* on mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*. So none of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w tasted|strong="H2938"\w* \add any\add* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.

And all \add they of\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*; and there was \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ground|strong="H7704"\w*.

And when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*, behold, the \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w dropped|strong="H1982"\w*; but no man \w put|strong="H5381"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*.

But \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* not when his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w charged|strong="H7650"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with the \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*: wherefore he put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* that \add was\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* it in an \w honeycomb|strong="H3295"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7725"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* were \w enlightened|strong="H0215"\w*.

Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w straitly|strong="H7650"\w* \w charged|strong="H7650"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with an \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \add any\add* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w faint|strong="H5774"\w*.\f + \fr 14.28 \ft faint: or, weary\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w troubled|strong="H5916"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, I pray you, how mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have been \w enlightened|strong="H0215"\w*, because I \w tasted|strong="H2938"\w* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* of this \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

How much \w more|strong="H0637"\w*, if \w haply|strong="H3863"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w freely|strong="H0398"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* which they \w found|strong="H4672"\w*? for had there not been now a much \w greater|strong="H7235"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* among the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*?

And they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w* to \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w faint|strong="H5774"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w flew|strong="H5860"\w* upon the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \add them\add* on the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add them\add* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

¶ Then they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in that they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye have \w transgressed|strong="H0898"\w*: \w roll|strong="H1556"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* unto me this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 14.33 \ft transgressed: or, dealt treacherously\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Disperse|strong="H6327"\w* yourselves among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Bring me \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* \add them\add* here, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* not against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* with \w him|strong="H3027"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \add them\add* there.\f + \fr 14.34 \ft with him: Heb. in his hand\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: the same was the \w first|strong="H2490"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 14.35  t the same…: Heb. that altar he began to build unto the \+nd LORD\+nd* *

¶ And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* them until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and let us not \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of them. And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* whatsoever \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto thee. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, Let us draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w hither|strong="H1988"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* counsel of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Shall I go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? wilt thou \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? But he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him not that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Draw ye \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w hither|strong="H1988"\w*, all the \w chief|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and \w know|strong="H3045"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w wherein|strong="H4100"\w* this \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* hath been this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 14.38 \ft chief: Heb. corners\f*

For, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which \w saveth|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, though it \w be|strong="H3426"\w* in \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. But \add there was\add* not a man among all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Be ye on \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w*, and I and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* will be on the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* what \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto thee.

Therefore \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* a \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \add lot\add*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* were \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: but the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w escaped|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 14.41 \ft Give…: or, Shew the innocent\f*\f + \fr 14.41 \ft escaped: Heb. went forth\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cast|strong="H5307"\w* \add lots\add* between me and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* me what thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I did \w but|strong="H2938"\w* \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* with the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* that \add was\add* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \add and\add*, \w lo|strong="H2009"\w*, I must \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* do \w so|strong="H6213"\w* and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*: for thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Shall \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, who hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w*: \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, there shall not one \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; for he hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* with \w God|strong="H0430"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rescued|strong="H6299"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* not.

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to their own \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

¶ So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against all his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, against \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and against \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and against the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*, and against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and whithersoever he \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* himself, he \w vexed|strong="H7561"\w* \add them\add*.

And he \w gathered|strong="H6213"\w* an \w host|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w spoiled|strong="H8154"\w* them.\f + \fr 14.48 \ft gathered…: or, wrought mightily\f*

Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* were \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, and \w Ishui|strong="H3440"\w*, and \w Melchi-shua|strong="H4444"\w*: and the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \add were these;\add* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w firstborn|strong="H1067"\w* \w Merab|strong="H4764"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w*:

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of his \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w*.\f + \fr 14.50 \ft Abner: Heb. Abiner\f*

And \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \add was\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*; and \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \add was\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiel|strong="H0022"\w*.

And there was \w sore|strong="H2389"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: and when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* any \w strong|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, or any \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, he \w took|strong="H0622"\w* him unto him.
